introduction.name: Muhammad.
introduction.title: I create websites on the internet
introduction.subtitle: I am a Frontend Developer specializing in creating and developing exceptional websites/web applications.

about_me.part1: I have been working as a front-end developer for 2 years, specializing in ReactJS and Typescript. My main stack is MERN with ReactJS or NextJS and I enjoy working with a team. I have been fully focused on developing my skills every day and these days I have been focusing on building beautiful and clean websites with ReactJS. and typescript.
about_me.part2: I look forward to working with any company and taking the company forward with new technologies and new languages.

project1.description: In this project, I made an Ecommerce application with the stack MERN React, added a payment system, a shopping cart system, Yandex Metrics to get users activity data and product filtering, a RestAPI, CRUD operations and MongoDB for storing all data about the products and orders. For this project, I used ReactJS, Redux, Styled-Components, Yandex Metrika, and a REST API backend built with Node, ExpressJS, and MongoDB.

project2.description: In this project, I created an admin panel for my e-commerce project to manage all products, users, and revenue details. For this project, I used React, Typescript, MUI, React-Router, Styled-Components and Recharts for charts.

project3.description: In this project, I made a React website that talks about space and some planets in the solar system. I made this project because I was interested in space and was happy to show people the space world in a site. For this project i used ReactJS, Typescript, React-router, StyledComponents and Figma for design.

project4.description: I made this website because I have used a lot of tracking websites and some of them didn't work properly, so I made my own which uses modern technologies to update the information. For this project I used NextJS, Typescript, Styled-Components, MaterialUI , SSR, and a small API backend so I can hide my API key.

project5.description: In this project, I created a book library that can search for books in the Google Books API and filter them with sorting and categories, and has a Load More button to download more books. For this project I used ReactJS, Styled-components and Typescript.

project6.description: In this project, I have created a news app with breaking news and different categories of news. For this project I used ReactJS, Styled-Components, Typescript, Redux Toolkit and NewsAPI.

project7.description: In this project, I created an application to manage your tasks, save their progress status, and add/remove tasks. For this project I used ReactJS, Typescript, Redux-Toolkit and Styled-Components.

contact_me.title: Contact Me
contact_me.description1: I am currently looking for any new opportunities, my mailbox is always open.
contact_me.description2: If you have a question or just want to say hello, I will do my best to answer you!
